ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, have you used drugs, other than alcohol or your prescribed medications?
In the past 30 days, I used drugs to feel more confident
In the past 30 days, I used drugs to feel good about myself
In the past 30 days, I used drugs to make it easier to talk to people
In the past 30 days, drugs made me feel like I could do anything
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, I used drugs to change my mood
In the past 30 days, I used drugs to have a good time
In the past 30 days, I used drugs because I liked the feeling
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, I used drugs to feel close to someone
In the past 30 days, while using drugs, I liked myself better
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, I used drugs to be a part of something
In the past 30 days, I used drugs to be open to new experiences
In the past 30 days, I used drugs to be more creative
In the past 30 days, people seemed to like me better when I used drugs
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, I used drugs to relax
In the past 30 days, I used drugs while enjoying TV, music, or video games
In the past 30 days, I enjoyed using drugs
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=A little bit; 3=Somewhat; 4=Quite a bit; 5=Very much

ElementDescription: In the past 30 days, I used drugs recreationally
In the past 30 days, I used drugs when I was with other people
Promis substance use raw score
Promis substance use t-score
Promis substance use standard error
Promis substance use theta
Miscellaneous comments on study, interview, methodology relevant to this form data
